name: 🎄 Planning for failure to ship faster 🎁 with Alex Sims, Solutions Architect & Senior Software Engineer at James & James (Ship It! #83)
summary: Eight months ago, in 🎧 episode 49, Alex Sims (Solutions Architect &amp; Senior Software Engineer at James &amp; James) shared with us his ambition to help migrate a monolithic PHP app running on AWS EC2 to a more modern architecture. The idea was some serverless, some EKS, and many incremental improvements. So how did ...
